site.author: Yordan Yordanov

about.title: My name is Yordan Panayotov Yordanov. Wood sculpture is my specialty and my passion.
about.text:
I was born in Straldzha, Bulgaria in 1962. I finished my secondary education in Secondary Special Art School "Georgi Stoikov Rakovski" in Kotel, Bulgaria specialty "Carving" in 1981 and my higher education in 1996 at the National Academy of Arts in Sofia, Bulgaria specialization "Carving" under associate professor V. Lilov.
I teach "Technology", specialization "Carving" at the National Art Academy in Sofia, Bulgaria. Since 1996 I am a member of the "Union of Bulgarian Artists" section "Carving".
I have a large number of participations in numerous exhibitions both in Bulgaria and in countries such as Belgium and France.

1.title: The VII National Symposium on Wood Sculpture begins in Byala
1.text: "The author's concepts are in the direction of stylized sculptures with an animal character and abstract compositions inspired by the motto of exhibition." --- Translated from Bulgarian

2.title: A national exhibition of the Woodcarving section is visiting Gabrovo
2.text: "According to art critics, and in practice, wood art today has a new form and content, and a vision that is up-to-date with world trends." --- Translated from Bulgarian

3.title: Forum woodwork
3.text: "Interior woodwork is a rare art form and through this traveling exhibition, the public will be exposed to its plastic characteristics, means of expression, inner life and world of ideas." --- Translated from Bulgarian

4.title: The wood carving, Myth and Legend
4.text: "Dancho's (Yordan Yordanov) modular sculptures, rendered in an instantly recognizable style that brings to the surface the internal tensions in a given structure, compose cosmogonic narratives of creation." --- Translated from Bulgarian
